commitMessage: @@@[FLINK-17899][runtime] Integrate FLIP-126 Watermarks with FLIP-27 Sources

@@@[FLINK-18011] Make WatermarkStrategy/WatermarkStrategies more ergonomic

This removes WatermarkStrategies and instead moves the convenience
entrypoint methods for strategies directly to WatermarmStrategy.

WatermarkStrategy is now also itself the builder for more complex
strategies instead of WatermarkStrategies.

@@@[FLINK-18820] Emit MAX_WATERMARK at the end in SourceOperator

Starting from this commit we emit a MAX_WATERMARK when all records are
produced in SourceOperator or a stop with savepoint was triggered.

This closes #13073
@@@[FLINK-19835] Make SourceOperator aware of BATCH/STREAMING execution mode
